unnormalised: **Home Loan Bonanza! Diwali Just Got Closer, Guys!**
normalised: **Home Loan Bonanza! Diwali Just Got Closer, Guys!**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Andheri? Or maybe that sweet little bungalow in Alibaug? Well, listen up! Home loan schemes are looking super attractive right now. HDFC, ICICI Bank, and even your friendly neighborhood cooperative bank, Janalakshmi, are rolling out some tempting offers.
normalised: Thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Andheri? Or maybe that sweet little bungalow in Alibaug? Well, listen up! Home loan schemes are looking super attractive right now. HDFC, I C I C I Bank, and even your friendly neighborhood cooperative bank, Janalakshmi, are rolling out some tempting offers.

unnormalised: We're talking slashed interest rates – some are dipping below 8%! Plus, processing fees are being waived faster than you can say "Biryani!" Banks are eager to lend, especially with Diwali right around the corner. Everyone wants to move in before the festivities, right?
normalised: We're talking slashed interest rates – some are dipping below eight percent! Plus, processing fees are being waived faster than you can say "Biryani!" Banks are eager to lend, especially with Diwali right around the corner. Everyone wants to move in before the festivities, right?

unnormalised: Amit Sharma from Navi Mumbai told us he snagged a deal that saved him almost Rs. 50,000 on upfront costs! Keep an eye out for special schemes for women borrowers, offering even better rates. Don't delay! Check out the fine print, compare offers, and make that dream home a reality this festive season! It's time to take the plunge and say goodbye to paying rent, forever!
